rules.natural: If the game system is tested, then it is integrated.
Provided that the game system is validated, it is tested.
If the vehicle is connected, then it is autonomous.
Provided that the vehicle is smart, it is also connected.
Whenever autonomous transportation is successful, then if the vehicle being certified does not imply non-compliance, the vehicle is smart.
Either the vehicle is malfunctioning or the game system is not operational.
If the financial product is approved, then it is profitable.
Either the financial product is approved or the technology is deployed.
Provided that the technology is deployed, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.
Whenever the game system is updated, then if the financial product is profitable, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.
If the technology is maintained, then whenever the financial product is profitable, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.
Provided that the vehicle is secure, it is functional.
If it is not the case that upgrading the vehicle implies functionality, then the vehicle is compliant.
Under the condition that upgrading the vehicle does not lead to functionality, the vehicle is certified.
Provided that the approval of the financial product does not lead to the vehicle not malfunctioning, the game system is validated.
Whenever the approval of the financial product does not result in the vehicle not malfunctioning, the game system is not integrated.
If it is not the case that the game system is updated or the technology is maintained, then the vehicle is upgraded.
Under the condition that the game system is not updated and the technology is not maintained, the vehicle is secure.
Whenever it is false that the game system is updated or the technology is maintained, the vehicle is not functional.
If the project is not funded, then the game system is operational.

Under the condition that the vehicle is certified, it is not compliant.
Whenever it is false that upgrading the vehicle results in functionality, the vehicle is not compliant.
Whenever the vehicle is upgraded, it becomes functional.
Provided that neither the game system is updated nor the technology is maintained, the vehicle is functional.
The game system is updated or the technology is maintained.
If the financial product is profitable, then the vehicle does not malfunction.
Under the condition that the financial product is approved, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.

The project is funded.

(A11 → A10).natural: If the game system is tested, then it is integrated.

(A12 → A11).natural: Provided that the game system is validated, it is tested.

(A13 → A8).natural: Whenever the vehicle is upgraded, it becomes functional.

(A15 → ¬A14).natural: Under the condition that the vehicle is certified, it is not compliant.

(A17 → A16).natural: If the vehicle is connected, then it is autonomous.

(A18 → A17).natural: Provided that the vehicle is smart, it is also connected.

(A19 → (¬(A15 → ¬A14) → A18)).natural: Whenever autonomous transportation is successful, then if the vehicle being certified does not imply non-compliance, the vehicle is smart.

(A2 ∨ ¬A1).natural: Either the vehicle is malfunctioning or the game system is not operational.

(A3 → A5).natural: If the financial product is approved, then it is profitable.

(A3 → ¬A2).natural: Under the condition that the financial product is approved, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: Either the financial product is approved or the technology is deployed.

(A4 → ¬A2).natural: Provided that the technology is deployed, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.

(A5 → ¬A2).natural: If the financial product is profitable, then the vehicle does not malfunction.

(A6 → (A5 → ¬A2)).natural: Whenever the game system is updated, then if the financial product is profitable, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: The game system is updated or the technology is maintained.

(A7 → (A5 → ¬A2)).natural: If the technology is maintained, then whenever the financial product is profitable, the vehicle is not malfunctioning.

(A9 → A8).natural: Provided that the vehicle is secure, it is functional.

(¬(A13 → A8) → A14).natural: If it is not the case that upgrading the vehicle implies functionality, then the vehicle is compliant.

(¬(A13 → A8) → A15).natural: Under the condition that upgrading the vehicle does not lead to functionality, the vehicle is certified.

(¬(A13 → A8) → ¬A14).natural: Whenever it is false that upgrading the vehicle results in functionality, the vehicle is not compliant.

(¬(A15 → ¬A14) → A16).natural: If the vehicle being certified does not imply non-compliance, then the vehicle is autonomous.

(¬(A15 → ¬A14) → A17).natural: Provided that certification does not lead to non-compliance, the vehicle is connected.

(¬(A15 → ¬A14) → A18).natural: Whenever certification does not result in non-compliance, the vehicle is smart.

(¬(A3 → ¬A2) → A10).natural: If the financial product being approved does not prevent malfunctioning, then the game system is integrated.

(¬(A3 → ¬A2) → A11).natural: Under the condition that approval of the financial product does not imply the vehicle is not malfunctioning, the game system is tested.

(¬(A3 → ¬A2) → A12).natural: Provided that the approval of the financial product does not lead to the vehicle not malfunctioning, the game system is validated.

(¬(A3 → ¬A2) → ¬A10).natural: Whenever the approval of the financial product does not result in the vehicle not malfunctioning, the game system is not integrated.

(¬(A6 ∨ A7) → A13).natural: If it is not the case that the game system is updated or the technology is maintained, then the vehicle is upgraded.

(¬(A6 ∨ A7) → A8).natural: Provided that neither the game system is updated nor the technology is maintained, the vehicle is functional.

(¬(A6 ∨ A7) → A9).natural: Under the condition that the game system is not updated and the technology is not maintained, the vehicle is secure.

(¬(A6 ∨ A7) → ¬A8).natural: Whenever it is false that the game system is updated or the technology is maintained, the vehicle is not functional.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the project is not funded, then the game system is operational.

¬A1.natural: The game system is not operational.
